      • getFileIconBitmap

        public Bitmap getFileIconBitmap()
        Gets the icon image associated with the file in the Bitmap format. If no icon image is defined, return the null value.
        Returns:
        The bitmap of the file image icon
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setFileIcon

        public boolean setFileIcon(Bitmap bmFileIcon)
        Sets the icon bitmap associated with the file. If the bitmap is created successfully, return true; if not or if the bitmap is null, return false.
        Parameters:
        bmFileIcon - The bitmap of the set file icon
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • setFileIcon

        public boolean setFileIcon(Context context,
                  java.lang.String strPackageName)
        Sets the bitmap of the file icon to a package name associated with the file. Extracts the icon bitmap internally using the package manager.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        strPackageName - The name of the package associated with the file
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • isInternalFile

        public boolean isInternalFile()
        Gets whether or not the attachment is an internal file that cannot directly access an external application.
        Returns:
        If it is an internal file, return true; if not or if no attachment is specified, return false.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • copyAttachedFile

        public java.lang.String copyAttachedFile(java.lang.String savePath)
        Copies the attachment to a specific path.
        Parameters:
        savePath - The path to save
        Returns:
        Returns the save path of the copied file. If no path is specified, or in case of a failure, returns null.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • viewAttachFile

        @Deprecated
public boolean viewAttachFile(Context context,
                                java.lang.String savePath)
        Deprecated. 
        Runs an external application to open the attachment according to the proper file association.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        savePath - A temporary directory that is used to save internal file attachments for viewing. (Internal file attachments cannot be viewed via an Intent in external applications, and must be copied to an external directory for viewing.)
        Necessary only for viewing decoded internal file attachments. (Not necessary for file attachments that are designated to an external directory.)
        Make sure to delete files in the path at an appropriate time.
        Returns:
        The result of viewing the attachment (If no external application associated with it is found, or in case of a failure to view it, return false)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • viewAttachedFile

        public boolean viewAttachedFile(Context context,
                       java.lang.String savePath)
        The external application executes the attachment via the Intent.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object
        savePath - A temporary directory that is used to save internal file attachments for viewing. (Internal file attachments cannot be viewed via an Intent in external applications, and must be copied to an external directory for viewing.)
        Necessary only for viewing decoded internal file attachments. (Not necessary for file attachments that are designated to an external directory.)
        Make sure to delete files in the path at an appropriate time.
        Returns:
        The result of viewing the attachment (If no external application associated with it is found, or in case of a failure to view it, return false)
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1, SAMM Library 1.3
